des:
Now you can use the Linkind skill to interact with your Linkind devices. There are multiple Linkind products for you to control by talking to your Alexa, including WiFi/Zigbee smart light bulbs, and WiFi smart plug. For dimmable smart lights, you can ask Alexa to turn on/off, adjust the brightness, while smart tunnable ones also enable you to change the ambience from warm to cool white. With Linkind skill, you can make the electric appliances connected to the plug be on/off as you want. 

Steps to use Linkind Device with Alexa:
1.Download “Linkind” app in Google Play or iOS App Store;
2.Create a Linkind account and connect the device on the app;
3.Search “Linkind” skill on Alexa, tap “ENABLE TO USE”;
4.Log in your Linkind account on Alexa and wait for Alexa to discover your devices.
5.Try to voice control Linkind devices

Here are some examples of the voice commands:

Lights(bedroom light is the name of the light in Linkind APP):
- Alexa, turn on bedroom light
- Alexa, turn off bedroom light
- Alexa, dim bedroom light
- Alexa, brighten bedroom light
- Alexa, set the bedroom light to 20 percent
- Alexa, set bedroom light to green.
- Alexa, set bedroom light to cool white.

Plugs
- Alexa, turn on plug 1
- Alexa, turn off plug 1

Any problems,please contact us at service@linkind.com
